casebody.data:
Mark HOOKS, Warden, petitioner,
v.
Mark LANGFORD. No. 14-983. Supreme Court of the United States June 29, 2015.

Opinion *2889Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperisgranted. On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Davis v. Ayala,576 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 2187, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2015).
